summary: This is a detailed household manual for staff at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence, outlining extensive protocols for guest relations, cleaning, maintenance, and personal service for Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It reveals the highly controlled, secretive environment and the emphasis on staff discretion and anticipating the needs of Epstein, Maxwell, and their guests.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary resident of the Palm Beach estate; the manual details extensive protocols for serving him, maintaining his spaces, and anticipating his needs.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Co-resident with Epstein; the manual details specific protocols for her bathroom, desk, breakfast preferences, and general service.

persons.name: Estate Manager
persons.context: The staff member through whom all questions and concerns are to be channeled, and who must be notified of emergencies.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Epstein's assistant in New York; general mail is to be sent to him twice a week when Epstein and Maxwell are not in residence.

persons.name: David
persons.context: Mentioned in a shopping list note as someone who, along with Ms. Maxwell, would advise on additional meat, poultry, or fish to purchase.

connections.description: Co-residents of the Palm Beach estate; the household manual treats them as a unit for staff protocols and service.
Epstein is the employer; the Estate Manager is the senior staff member responsible for overseeing household operations.
Maxwell is a co-resident/employer; the Estate Manager is the senior staff member responsible for household operations.
Epstein is the employer; Gany is his assistant in New York who handles mail and deliveries.

events.title: Household Manual Creation/Revision
events.description: The date the detailed household manual for Epstein's Palm Beach residence was created or last revised.

events.title: Pre-Arrival Shopping
events.description: A specific pre-arrival shopping list was generated for provisions at the Palm Beach residence.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The manual instructs staff: 'Remember that you see nothing, hear nothing, say nothing, except to answer a question directed at you. Respect their privacy.'
A pre-arrival checklist for the Master Bedroom includes: 'Gun placed in beside table drawer.'
The manual details extensive protocols for guest pick-up, escorting to rooms, unpacking luggage, and gathering emergency contact and food allergy information.
Specific, high-end toiletries and products are listed for Epstein and Maxwell, revealing a lavish lifestyle.
The document demonstrates a highly organized, secretive, and controlling household environment with military-like precision for staff conduct.
